website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for customers with limited hand strength. Users simply squeeze a button on the side of the unit to call for assistance.
pros: Can be worn around the neck or carried in a pocket
Squeeze buttons on sides of pendant to call caregiver
Range of 450 feet in a relatively open area
Choices to add-on extra buttons, receivers and necklaces available
cons: Receiver unit plugs into wall, so it's not portable
Consider buying additional receivers for multiple house zones
Alarm only rings twice rather than multiple times

customer_reviews.title: Awesome SOS Doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome doorbell! Very easy installation - had it working in a minute! The sound is loud and clear, and can be heard throughout the whole house. Love the light up feature on the SOS ring. up in installation had the system working in minutes. Great selection of ring tunes - a must buy for anyone looking for an SOS doorbell!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is very good. The chime is loud enough to be heard ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. The chime is loud enough to be heard in the house (4000 sf house). It can be used by two different persons, too. No installation, just plug it into the electric wall outlet, and it works. Very good product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: W Magic

customer_reviews.title: Variety of uses
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is multiple handicapped and as such requires close care. She sleeps in a respirator similar to the old iron lungs and has no way to contact us except thru hollering which isn't practical so we use the Sado doorbell inside her respirator and when she pushes it we have it pluged in our hall way so we can hear it when sleeping and when we are in our kitchen and living room. It's working perfectly and also the donut necklace provides safe communication when she is outside. A great little piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Frank & Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: great for disabled
customer_reviews.text: I have a disabled daughter. this has been great for her as she has limited use of her hands. I put the round one in her hand and she can activate it very easily. I've looked at many but this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: easy to use system for my grandfather to alert us ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my grandfather who lives with my mother. We were looking for a simple, easy to use system for my grandfather to alert us if he needs assistance. This is awesome! He wears the. Each lace all day and in the evening he takes it off. We attached the remote to the wall by his bed (it comes with an adhesive strip) we can then bring the adapter to different parts of the house to listen. This was such an amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Aly B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent buzzer for the price, good range.
customer_reviews.text: Needs an option for wrist wear, and doesn't offer safety lanyard when wearing around the neck. Otherwise, the buzzer chime is pretty loud and my grandmother has no problem working the neck button to let us know she needs something. A better option would be to include a spiral bungee key ring - the type librarians have, and affix the donut button to it. My grandmother would find it easier, and it would be safer on her arm.
customer_reviews.author: CDogg

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this system.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised this is a nice little system with many uses. The instructions are very easy to follow. The pairing took literally 1 second for each of the buttons so the total time to set this up is under 5 minutes most of which is spent selecting the chime you want. For our use the door and sos buttons are within 40 feet of the main unit and it works flawlessly. Lastly and I may have overlooked it but I didn't see a way to have a different chime for the SOS button vs door button. That would make this a perfect system.
customer_reviews.author: DanC

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my elderly mother could alert me if she should need anything during the night. I was shocked at how easy it was to use. I like how I can change the tune from a series of beeps to a melody. I also can adjust the sound. She wears the one button around her neck and has the other one mounted on the wall in the bathroom. Gives me peace of mind. Great quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Caregiver Call Button - Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I bought this for my 80 year old father who sleeps in a different room than his caregiver. When he needs help, he just has to press either the necklace button or the permanently mounted button. The receiver then rings in the caregivers room. It has a doorbell ringing sound which is loud and is much more pleasant than a buzzer sound. The only challenge has been convincing my father to keep the necklace on.
customer_reviews.author: Angie in SC

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad who has fallen a couple times in his memory care facility and may have been on the floor for up to 2 hours before anyone found him. Now he can call for help. The tones are very happy "door bell" sounding. For use as a caregiver call button, I wish there were a tone that implied more urgency. Volume could be louder also. For now I've selected the longest playing one so it's more likely to get the attention of the staff. "Camptown Races" plays for about 20 seconds before shutting off.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: You can change the ring tone that's nice. I bought this for my mother when she ...
customer_reviews.text: The little string attachment for the life saver is too thin and broke off. Should be stronger. People who sleep with this device on will roll over or get it a bit tangled in the sheets and then it can break off there. Otherwise not complaints, worked well. You can change the ring tone that's nice.I bought this for my mother when she came to live in hospice care at my house. I wish I still had a use for it. It made us all feel better to know she could summon us at any time. Take care of your loved ones :-)
customer_reviews.author: poesie

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with the product when I received it
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product to help with my bedridden husband calling me. I was very pleased with the product when I received it. The directions were straight forward and easy to understand. It was very easy to synchronize the receiver with the SOS button. The volume control as well as the choice of ring tones made it nice to personalize. The button was upstairs away from the receiver but it operated well over the distance. The SOS button is very easy for him to use,( And use it well he does!!) It is also a bonus to have a regular doorbell setup to use if we needed it in the future. Met our needs very well.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty much a doorbell really. You plug it in an outlet, press the handheld button and it rings a chime. It has fun chimes to choose from. This unit is great for elderly. It’s not meant as a doorbell to go on the outside of a house. The donut shaped button didn’t work after a few days but it might be the battery that came with it. This unit is the easiest to use for elderly that still are aware and not enduring too much dementia.
customer_reviews.author: 3CatsKindOfGal

customer_reviews.title: NICE AND LOUD- GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: An easy-to-use alerting device. Both the button and wearable device are easy to use. The multiple ring-tones are nice but the real plusses are the volume for this hard-of-hearing senior and the ease of use. I hope this review posts because I've sent two previously and can't find them in the reviews for this device.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: This device is perfect for 24 hour caregivers
customer_reviews.text: This device is perfect for 24 hour caregivers. The bell we were using was not always audible when we were in a deep sleep 20 feet down the hall. The receiver will play many types of chimes/tunes and has adjustable volume. The round transmitter is very user friendly for our patient. We also bought a second receiver, one for our bedroom and one for the main living area. I am VERY glad I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Woody54

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, nicely packaged, with easy set-up. Good volume controls and numerous sound choices...even happy birthday! I have a newly blind, elderly father who needs help to bathroom. He wears the lanyard during the day and at night we loop it around his hand. There is also an additional piece that can be mounted on a wall. The ringer/doorbell type unit plugs into any outlet. It seems to have a good range.
customer_reviews.author: MAK-NY

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a caregiver! However, they are a bit overpriced due to lack of competition in this space.
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and works great for a caregiver. Just plug into an outlet close to the caregiver and get notified with a doorbell chime when either of the two fobs are pressed. These are a little overpriced in my opinion, however there are not a lot of products like this out there (especially marketed to caregivers).
customer_reviews.author: C. Britton

customer_reviews.title: Order extra LR44 batteries!
customer_reviews.text: This device has worked quite well for us, reliably allowing an elderly family member to call for assistance over the length of our fairly long house. We're finding that a set of three LR44 batteries for the necklace lasts a week or two and they are fairly expensive if purchased in the local drugstore. I've found a 15-pack here on Amazon to be a much better deal.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: Fall risk patient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for what we needed. My dad has parkinson. He is pretty self sufficient but a big fall risk. I sewed this into a watch band so he could wear it as a watch instead of a necklace and it works perfect. It enables him to be independant as well as not having us watch his every move like a hawk but at the sametime lets us have a way of knowing in a second if he needs help.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful device
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device I bought it for my 90 year old mother who used it twice the first day An excellent way of us keeping in touch in the house no matter where she is, or where I am. Now I don't have to worry that I might not hear her. I put the receiver in the middle of the house so I can hear it from any room, including the basement. It gives me great peace of mind knowing I can always hear her.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda D.

customer_reviews.title: This product seems well made and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Positives: This product seems well made and is easy to use. Negatives: the SOS Life Alert Panic button (the doughnut shape that someone can wear around their neck) did not work, the batteries in it were dead. But SadoTech was responsive when I emailed them and quickly sent new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: C. Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Truly a Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this item, I thought it might come in handy one day. Well, we recently had a surprising event that literally helped to save a life. Thank you for this product. It works as described. While it may be a little sensitive, I'd rather have a false alarm than none at all.
customer_reviews.author: Debra L. Knighton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, worked out of the box. Super convenient....strongly recommend if you are looking for an alert system to help elderly family member reach out to caregiver
customer_reviews.author: Dad Right

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly mother
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my mom to be able to get my attention in the middle of the night. The instructions for setting it up are non-existent but....it was very easy and works perfect...
customer_reviews.author: MLJ

customer_reviews.title: Best system for parent or disabled child
customer_reviews.text: I bought this system so that I did not constantly have to check on my disabled sister upstairs when I had to work during the day and at night if she needed to go to the restroom. Of all the things I bought for the house to care for her, this was the best and the most inexpensive. Since then, I have bought 2 as gifts for friends who now care for their disabled parents. No more waking up in the middle of the night to check if they are OK. Loud bell, you will definitely wake up if they need you!
customer_reviews.author: J. Ladner

customer_reviews.title: Works well but...
customer_reviews.text: This system works well. My only problem is that while my grandfather stays in one place but I don't. I either need a second plug-in chime or a portable chime. This system does not work with other SadoTech products, therefore I had to purchase an entire second kit to get the setup I need.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars if 2 receivers.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for father, who is bed ridden to call us when he needs us and it is working wonderfully. The call button that can be worn around the neck is very easy for him to use. The only reason it did not get 5 stars is that we could not hear the bell on both floors. We purchased a second unit to have one upstairs and one downstairs, but he has to wear two call buttons around his neck. Would be great is it was expandable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son and I share a split level. This is my second sadotech and now we each have a doorbell and don't have to run up or down to see who it's for. I also have health issues so keep the sos button nearby. Haven't had to use it but it does give me a sense of security because it's awful to fall and not be able to yell loud enough for help.
customer_reviews.author: Robin H

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be just right after my daughter has her extensive surgery. I will be able to move from room to room and still know when to help her. It is a good quality product and I am more than happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Springer

customer_reviews.title: Works well but have to replace batteries every 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It's very simple to use- and works great. We use it as a call button for my disabled father whose room is on the other side of the house. But it would work as a wireless doorbell too. You need to replace the 3 watch batteries about every 6 months and there are no instructions for doing so. btw use a box cutter to pop it open.
customer_reviews.author: D. Haku

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I wish they would have a battery indicator ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wish they would have a battery indicator so I can change the battery when it's low.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Multiple loud choices for ring. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Multiple loud choices for ring. Bought it for mother who has difficulty speaking due to COPD and it,s already being used too often. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very good wireless doorbell
customer_reviews.text: We bought this wireless doorbell for the dad to ring us in the night he needed us. Very simple to set up and works like a charm. It has different rings and volume settings for your choises. I think it was a good price for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Dutchman

customer_reviews.title: Ok, does the job, but with issues.
customer_reviews.text: Goes off accidentally frequently, and the batteries died about a month in. I was able to buy some replacement batteries, but the screw stripped in the plastic, so now I'm holding it together with gorilla tape. It does what I need it to do, letting me know when my elderly mother needs me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: ... her caretaker when she needs help but we were disappointed in the battery use
customer_reviews.text: This item works for my mom who uses it to call her caretaker when she needs help but we were disappointed in the battery use. After one week, it started flashing blue like the batteries were dead so they went out and bought new batteries. It is still flashing blue and it has been synced to the receiver and has new batteries. We are happy she has something to call someone with but disappointed it is giving her problems. She cannot sleep with the flashing blue lights.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Works really well! Glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to set up and easy to use. Works really well. You can change the tune and you can change the volume as well. There are many tunes to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product works good, wish i had two more plug in though.
customer_reviews.author: debbie stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to use with my mother when she was too sick to get out of her bed by herself. It worked great and allowed her to ring for me during the night when she needed me.
customer_reviews.author: crazypants

customer_reviews.title: Call button review
customer_reviews.text: Yes received product and was satisfied with it for 85 year old mother. She does have Dementia so happy table button came with it. SOS button little confusing since has to squeeze sides. We're still working on necklace. Receiver has to be reset with tune versus doorbell sound each time reply receiver in. Was happy it came with batteries, just had to plug it in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far. We use it as a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far. We use it as a medical call button in our house. We are using the "Oh! Susanna" call setting, there are many to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Works great and very loud
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a resident in my small care hm. It’s really loud, so I can hear it anywhere in the house. Which is awesome. The only negative I have is it needs more call button sounds. The music is not very appropriate for my Care home situation.
customer_reviews.author: annb

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I used this in a sickroom and it worked great. It's quite loud, and you can put the button up anywhere. The button was in the bedroom and the bell was in the living room, maybe 30 feet apart, and there was no problem.
customer_reviews.author: billfish

customer_reviews.title: Must have for senior caregivers
customer_reviews.text: Reliable. Adjustable volume. Plugged into hallway outlet and can hear throughout the house. Absolute peace of mind for a caregiver. So happy to have found this call button... and pack away the annoying baby monitor and handheld bell my elderly MIL used to use to call for help.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty698

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and has worked well for us! certainly gives us peace of mind for our loved one!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Bauersfeld

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Nice clear bell sound with good range. My elderly mother can alert us with her remote, even when she's outdoors. Can hear it throughout the house, but it's not obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose but limited radio and audible ranges.
customer_reviews.text: The range is not sufficient to activate the receiver from the upstairs bedroom to the downstairs office and the sound of the receiver is great in the office but is barely audible one room away. By placing the receiver in a downstairs hall, it is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Very loud. Just what my mother needed to alert me. Was easy to set up and so far I have had no problems with the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: My 87 year old Mom uses this whenever she needs anything as she stays on the 3rd floor. When I'm in the lower level I never worry that her needs aren't going unnoticed. She loves it. Unfortunately, She likes testing it on us as a joke to see how fast we respond! :-/ LOL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly! Just what we needed to allow a relaxing night's sleep with an elderly parent downstairs who might need help.
customer_reviews.author: CAR

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for in-house fall alerts
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to use and perfect for peace of mind to look out for elderly family in case they fall.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tracy

customer_reviews.title: It works better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, and through masonry walls, so the signal goes beyond what I expected, and the receiver was put far away from the ring. I just wish the ring had a wrist version, so it’s not left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Renato G. Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Wide range . In a two floor house it reaches every corner. Sound is loud enough. Very efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Plugged it in and was ready to go. Using it as an emergency notification with-in the house.
customer_reviews.author: John Cernak

customer_reviews.title: Nice loud easy to set up well made product.
customer_reviews.text: It's loud and I can hear it throughout the house and our large yard. Thank god we haven't needed it.
customer_reviews.author: flc

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Caregivers
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 different doorbells, that couldn't reach 80 feet thru my house, but this works perfectly. I love that you can change the tune, and adjust the volume. Perfect for my Mom to call me from the other end of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie L Hertel

customer_reviews.title: Works great good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great lots of ringtones available and very good volume control
customer_reviews.author: Viejo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Makes me feel safe.
customer_reviews.text: Was having issues not being heard when I'ld call out for help to my family members in my home. I ordered the Sadi Tech Medical Alert System. I wear the lifesaver pendant ang my family's response is immediate. Thank you Sado Tech.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Gray

customer_reviews.title: My husband can easily push the button and it is loud enough for ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband can easily push the button and it is loud enough for me to hear when I am downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: v l q.

customer_reviews.title: Have very good performance.
customer_reviews.text: Now I use with my mother with two transmitters and two receivers. This configuration cross four walls. About three rooms. And one floor. We used in 120 Vac. Have very good performance.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Massami Mitikami

customer_reviews.title: Great for the elderly
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my elderly dad. Now he can get our attention when we are anywhere in the house without yelling. Gives him a feeling of security having this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Bly

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Wish the hanging botton were waterproof. Also wish there were more ringing sounds. Other than that works well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lechu

customer_reviews.title: Best call button ever!
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely amazing - so easy to set up - truly a lifesaver. My 93 year old mother has macular degeneration and even though she has access to her cell phone if she needs to call anyone else in the house this is perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for seniors and their caretaker
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My dad keeps it with him so that he can get my attention immediately. Very happy with this and plan to expand it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Frankowski

customer_reviews.title: Call button
customer_reviews.text: Yes it arrived on time. Exceeded expectation the sound was loud and clear enough for our needs. My mother in law is able to attract attention easily with the panic button on the cord. Good job
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Patient Call Button is Useful
customer_reviews.text: My mother uses the call button to let us know when she needs some help at night. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This SOS Multifunctional Wireless Doorbell works great. It has an impressive operating range enabling the receiver/doorbell to chime several rooms away from outside a front door. I am quite satisfied with my purchase, and I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Russell G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and will come in handy because my son and ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and will come in handy because my son and I live in a trailer and his room is far from mine.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Pitcock

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly. Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gadget! It has made life easier for me and my mom who is temporarily bedridden.
customer_reviews.author: arlene walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for home health alert!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our mother who was injured in a fall and rehabbing at home (tri-level house) with home health aides. This system works great!
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It actually works much farther than advertised. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: easy setup, great in home paging for elderly or ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, easy setup, great in home paging for elderly or invalid.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Goes off randomly
customer_reviews.text: Bought in the end of August... stopped working in November ... goes off randomly... will not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina Kotelenets

customer_reviews.title: The easy use of the call button
customer_reviews.text: Loved the easy ability for the elderly person to use the system. A two-way system was too cumbersome, and a baby monitor would be too noisy for the caregiver to get a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Frances Tilton

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for in home caregiving My Dad wears this around ...
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for in home caregiving My Dad wears this around his neck and we can hear it throughout the house. I highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Easy to use and provides peace of mind that we can help when needed without having to stay in the same room.
customer_reviews.author: T. Plaski

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Super easy to install and was the perfect ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Super easy to install and was the perfect call button for a senior.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Paisley

customer_reviews.title: SOS Doorbell Is Exactly What My Father Needed
customer_reviews.text: I needed an affordable caregiver alert pager for my father who mostly stays in his bedroom. Instead of yelling out and waiting and hoping for someone to hear him, he can squeeze his neck worn button and the call will alert the nurse immediately if she's stepped away from his bedroom. What a great idea and great value.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in a timely manner. Very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: TL1435

customer_reviews.title: I bought this when I was taking care of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I was taking care of my mother. We have a large to story house and you could here the bell even outside.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective
customer_reviews.text: Product had a range of only 16 inches. Returned it and got a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Raul J.

customer_reviews.title: To make the hanging unit a touch button for ease
customer_reviews.text: To hard for my husband to use ,cant squeeze it
customer_reviews.author: Terri Keese

customer_reviews.title: Excellent so far!
customer_reviews.text: This set works just as description indicates! Easy set up with two transmitters and one receiver. Various options to customize if you want.
customer_reviews.author: BLF

customer_reviews.title: The item is easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: The item is easy to install and use. Just follow the instructions which are few. It came with batteries inside and an extra set. It worked when I tested it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love our call button. Works great and really like the variety of sounds.
customer_reviews.author: donna m.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need to take care of my wife.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Przychodzien

customer_reviews.title: but glad it came with an extra set of batteries because ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but glad it came with an extra set of batteries because the ones in the neck piece were already not working.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed!
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a call button and a doorbell. Loud and the various rings are a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Am very pleased with the product thus far
customer_reviews.text: Am very pleased with the product thus far, have had to be used once. I like the fact I don't have to pay someone to monitor it...it goes directly to a family member who can make any decision necessary if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful device!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product! So easy to use and very effective. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Mond

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure this will work just fine. my mom is disabled so she in one ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure this will work just fine.my mom is disabled so she in one part of the house and no one hears her calling.now they can’t say they didn’t hear her .
customer_reviews.author: Lomi McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectation as spouse always was shouting my name ...

customer_reviews.author: roblaut

customer_reviews.title: We sent this product back because it simply did not ...
customer_reviews.text: We sent this product back because it simply did not work. The necklace never worked so we used the "door bell" as my Grandpa's call light. Well shortly after starting to use it (within one day) that no longer worked as well. I did just as the instructions said and "synced" all of the items together. Our house is very small so the distance should not have been an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for caregivers
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Super fast delivery. The only complaint I would have is the batteries in the necklace needed replaced in less than 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M.

product_meta.title: SadoTech Necklace Caregiver Call Button - Pendant Caregiver Pager & SOS Wireless Doorbell, Medical Alert System for Assisted Living Home Attendant, Nurses, Seniors and Persons with Disabilities
product_meta.description: Wireless Remote Call Button & Personal Doorbell Pager - Caregiver Alert System For Home Attendant, Nurses, Seniors and Persons With Dis
feature_bullets: A MUST HAVE PRACTICAL AND SIMPLE DYI ASSISTED LIVING DEVICE. IDEAL FOR THE ELDERLY, HANDICAPPED, OR SICK TO PAGE THEIR CAREGIVER. Also good for massage therapists, the perfect answer to knowing for sure when the client is ready without waiting too long to enter the room or not giving them enough time before knocking.

THE TRANSMITTER CAN BE WORN CONVENIENTLY AROUND THE NECK OR CARRIED IN A POCKET. Simply pressing a button on the transmitter will cause the receiver to alert a loud sound. There are 32 selectable alert tones to choose from.

PAGER AND CALL BUTTONS ARE EASY INSTALL AND TO USE. 4 VOLUME LEVELS (50-80db) accommodate babies and light sleepers. Make volume and music selections easily with 2 buttons located on the side of the plug-in receiver.
THE PERFECT GIFT FOR YOUR LOVED ONES AND SENIORS. DON'T WAIT, ADD TO CART NOW WHILE SUPPLIES LAST.

DOWNLOAD OUR "10 MORE WAYS TO USE sadotech wireless doorbell ” GUIDE - Did you know that our customers use SadoTech doorbells to train dogs, teachers love using it to quiet down classrooms, seniors and disabled use SadoTech doorbells as assisted living call pagers, and more!
